verbose_text: In the present study, we found that r-OPN improves functional outcomes, alleviates brain edema, and reduces cell apoptosis by regulating apoptosis related PI3K/Akt/GSK-3beta signaling pathways in a preclinical rat model of ICH.
evidence: r-OPN improves functional outcomes, alleviates brain edema, and reduces cell apoptosis by regulating apoptosis-related PI3K/Akt/GSK-3beta
